definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.chinese: 我要了杜松子酒和苦艾酒。

sentences.english: His gin is also an audacious animal, odd and thrilling.
sentences.chinese: 他的杜松子酒也是一个大胆的产物，奇怪且令人惊颤。

sentences.english: Sipsmith Gin, Rhubarb and Rosehip Cordial, Lemon Juice, Vanilla Syrup.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杜松子酒，大黄和玫瑰甜果汁，柠檬汁，香草。

sentences.english: He drank three cups of Du Shong Zi wine and some beer expect a half bottle of whisky.
sentences.chinese: 除了半瓶威士忌，他还喝了三杯杜松子酒和一些啤酒。

sentences.english: She sat sip ping gin from a bone china cup.
sentences.chinese: 她坐着嗫饮骨瓷杯中的杜松子酒。

sentences.english: I looked longingly at the paper sack of gin.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望看一眼杜松子酒纸袋。

sentences.english: He got full of gin and laid round Wright's poolroom all day.
sentences.chinese: 他灌了一肚子杜松子酒，在赖特台球室躺了一天。

sentences.english: I'll have a gin and tonics with lemon and ice, please.
sentences.chinese: 我要杯带柠檬和冰块的奎宁杜松子酒。

sentences.english: Wembley London Dry Gin N. V.
sentences.chinese: 威丽优质伦敦口味纯干杜松子酒。
这杯杜松子酒，这咸咸的土地。

sentences.english: A very dry martini is almost like straight gin.
sentences.chinese: 非常干的马丁尼酒几乎就像纯杜松子酒一样。

sentences.english: Except half bottle of Whiskey, he also drank three glasses of jackey and some beer.
sentences.chinese: 除了半瓶威士忌，他还喝了三杯杜松子酒和一些啤酒。

sentences.english: Besides half a bottle of Whisky, he drank three gins and beer.
sentences.chinese: 除了半瓶威士忌，他还喝了三杯杜松子酒和一些啤酒。

sentences.english: I offer to this ground, this gin.
sentences.chinese: 我走向大地，端着杜松子酒。

sentences.english: She added only a hint of vermouth to the gin.
sentences.chinese: 她只在杜松子酒里加了少许苦艾酒。

sentences.english: Besides half bottle of whiskey he drank three cups of gin and some beers.
sentences.chinese: 除了半瓶威士忌，他还喝了三杯杜松子酒和一些啤酒。
